As you work towards your B.S. in Data Science, program coursework will teach you: Mathematical foundations in data analysis Technical skills for data processing and application development Advanced machine learning and statistical modeling techniques Analytical and communication skills to explain results in a meaningful way You’ll take a common core of courses in computer science, programming, mathematics and software during your first two years, after which you will select data science courses with a more narrow focus based on your interests. For international students: this program is a STEM-designated program, which can qualify you to extend your post-graduation stay in the United States.
